content: this lovely crochet shawl features a breezy openwork design for just the right amount of coverage stitched in aunt lydia s baby shower you ll work on the bias from 1 stitch and use increases and decreases to shape the fabric into its triangular shape you ll learn how to do a magic_ring as well as double_crochet and chain techniques you ve got 70 in length to create a variety of stylish looks materials aunt lydia® baby shower™ 170 yds/155 m dark dogwood 8820 3 balls measurements approx 24 x 70 71 x 178 cm
